title: Do not miss messages when Kafka Topic Partitioned
author: Emre Savcı
description: A quick introduction to balance strategies. Consume events in the newly added partitions using Golang IBM/ sarama on the Kafka topics.
cntitle: Kafka主题分区后避免消息丢失
cndescription: 关于负载均衡策略的快速介绍。使用 Golang IBM/sarama 在 Kafka 主题上消费新添加的分区中的事件。
